name: Gritsy Bitsy Teeny Weeny Yellow Anti-Slip Machiney
name_original: Gritsy Bitsy Teeny Weeny Yellow Anti-Slip Machiney
description:
For the Bitsy Snow jam by @jonosandilands.

In winter 2017 Doncaster Council ran a twitter poll to name two new road gritters to their current fleet of punny gritters. Read about it in this article.

One of the two new gritters was aptly named Gritsy Bitsy - so it made sense for the Bitsy Snow jam. 

"It's right up there with the coolest things ever." Doncaster Council
